spec.token: This is the embedtoken property returned from the call to verify the status of the transaction
spec.currency: This is the specified currency to charge the card in
spec.amount: This is the amount to be charged
spec.email: This is the email address of the customer
spec.first_name: This is the first name of the card holder or the customer
spec.last_name: This is the last name of the card holder or the customer
spec.ip: IP - Internet Protocol. This represents the IP address of where the transaction is being carried out.
spec.narration: This is a custom description added by the merchant
spec.tx_ref: This is the unique reference, unique to the particular transaction being carried out. It is generated by the merchant for every transaction
spec.meta: passed as "meta": [{"metaname": "flightID", "metavalue": "123949494DC"}] . These are extra set of parameters that can be passed to your pay button.
spec.device_fingerprint: This is the fingerpringt for the device being used. It can be generated using a library on whatever platform is being used
spec.payment_plan: Pass the Payment plan ID to initiate a recurring payment.
spec.subaccounts: This is an array of objects containing the subaccount IDs to split the payment into
